title: 03/03/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/03/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, Dan opens the show talking about the woes in the city of Houston ahead of James Harden’s tonights. Harden is just one of many stars who have departed from the city seeking greener pastures elsewhere. Turner Sports’ Greg Anthony joined the show in the second hour to talk about the state of the NBA, from LeBron getting tonight’s game off, to how Chris Paul is a top five MVP candidate in his eyes. Lastly, ESPN college basketball analyst Jay Bilas hopped on the show to talk about the stretch run of college basketball, from the stars, to the top teams, and even how some mid-major teams could shock fans come the NCAA Tournament.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
